remarks: Rearrangement of 4 terms in a mixed vector addition and subtraction. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-2007.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
vcni.1 $e |- G = ( 1st ` W ) $.
vcni.2 $e |- S = ( 2nd ` W ) $.
vcni.3 $e |- X = ran G $.
vcsub4 $p |- ( ( W e. CVecOLD /\ ( A e. X /\ B e. X ) /\ ( C e. X /\ D e. X ) ) -> ( ( A G B ) G ( -u 1 S ( C G D ) ) ) = ( ( A G ( -u 1 S C ) ) G ( B G ( -u 1 S D ) ) ) ) $.
